name: Mekanism
tagline: The Soul and Science of Storytelling.
description:
Mekanism is an award-winning full service creative agency with offices in San Francisco, New York, Chicago, and Seattle. We work closely with the world’s best brands to create shareable and provocative campaigns that engage audiences.
Mekanism has been named to Ad Age's “Agency A-List,” Creativity's “The Creative 50,” Effie’s “Most Effective Independent Agencies,” and we have been profiled by The New York Times, Fast Company and ABC’s “Nightline.” Mekanism’s campaigns have been covered and studied by Harvard Business School.
